pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complex Pearson Distributions // Probability mass function, distribution function, quantile function and random generation for the Complex Triparametric Pearson (CTP) and Complex Biparametric Pearson (CBP) distributions developed by Rodriguez-Avi et al (2003) doi:10.1007/s00362-002-0134-7, Rodriguez-Avi et al (2004) doi:10.1007/BF02778271 and Olmo- Jimenez et al (2018) doi:10.1080/00949655.2018.1482897. The package also contains maximum-likelihood fitting functions for these models.
